text: Palais () may refer to: * Palace, Palais in French **Grand Palais, the Grand Palais des Champs-Elysées **Petit Palais, an art museum in Paris * Palais River in the French département of Deux-Sèvres * Dance hall, popularly a palais de danse, in the 1950s and 1960s in the UK *Richard Palais (born 1931), American mathematician *Le Palais, Morbihan, France ==See also== *Palais Royal (disambiguation) * Palai (disambiguation) * Palace (disambiguation) * Palas (disambiguation)
title: Palais
